title: Introducing New Talent
description:
At Devoxx UK we're committed to offering a hand to folks who want to break into speaking at conferences. Working with the good people at the London Java Community, we've brought together a variety of new speakers, and this session is their chance to step onto the conference stage for the first time.


Join us and give them a warm welcome.


Your speakers and sessions are:


Edirin Atumah: Knowing your personal significance - an instant influence booster

This talks discusses how staying at the level of skills alone can reduce your impact, and suggests an alternative way to look at how you can find, feed and use your personal significance in any environment.


Leena Mooneeram: Why you aren’t a 10x Engineer… yet

The path of the 10x engineer has been well documented, poured over, discussed and debated. So, have you achieved it? Are we there yet? Leena will revisit the definition, taking in the view from a vantage point of Developer Culture, and provide her opinion on what could help boost you to 10x.


Maddie Clingan: The Ruthless Elimination of Process

Continuous improvement also requires continuous binning. The bin is our friend, let's talk about using it.


Fahad Sheikh: Why Test First Driven Development Matters
